categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: The Chie was a MC40a light cruiser used by the Rebel Alliance.

It was attacked by a squadron of Strike-class medium cruisers called Longbow who were assisted by Avenger Squadron in TIE/ad starfighters, and Assault Gunboats. The cruiser had X-wings from Rogue Squadron, B-wings and A-wings.
Whether or not the Chie is destroyed is up to the player's decision.
